title: Flight and Pursuit
goal: The group is forced to adapt and escape Valerius's immediate, violent retaliation, showcasing their combined combat and evasion skills.
stakes_shift: Their plan goes awry, forcing them into a desperate flight for survival against overwhelming odds, threatening to scatter the alliance.

bridge.from_prev: The public confrontation with Valerius has erupted into chaos.
bridge.to_next: The group discovers the true, hidden source of the blight within the city, revealing Valerius's deeper, more sinister plan.

sections.title: Desperate Escape
sections.intent: The group fights their way out of the immediate danger, relying on their individual strengths.

scenes.summary: Eldrin unleashes ancient magic, Kael cuts a path, and Lyra guides them through the panicked crowds, fending off Valerius's guards.
scenes.outcome: The group successfully fights their way out of the immediate danger, escaping the city square.

sections.title: Through the Labyrinth
sections.intent: The pursuit continues through the city, testing their evasion skills and cooperation.

scenes.summary: They navigate the city's back alleys and rooftops, with Valerius's relentless forces hot on their heels, using every trick to evade capture.
scenes.outcome: The group successfully evades Valerius's relentless pursuit through the city, but remains trapped within its walls.

sections.title: A Hidden Path
sections.intent: Seraphina reveals a secret escape route or hiding place known only to scholars.

scenes.summary: Seraphina remembers a forgotten network of tunnels beneath the city, traditionally used by scholars for clandestine meetings.
scenes.outcome: Seraphina leads the group to a secret network of tunnels beneath the city, offering a temporary reprieve.
